amendment.description: To ensure redistributed funds go towards coverage of low-income children or outreach and enrollment of low-income children, rather than to States that will use the funds to cover children from higher income families.
amendment.purpose: To ensure redistributed funds go towards coverage of low-income children or outreach and enrollment of low-income children, rather than to States that will use the funds to cover children from higher income families.

action.text: Amendment SA 67 proposed by Senator Cornyn.

vote.text: Motion to table amendment SA 67 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 64 - 33. Record Vote Number: 20.
